title: managerLink
content:
Help Manual for Link/Delink Screen

This screen is used by administrators to manage the linking or delinking of consultants to specific consultant managers.

1. Page Overview

  • Title: Link/Delink â€“ This screen is for linking available consultants to consultant managers or delinking those who are already associated.
  • Admin Section: This section indicates the admin mode for managing consultants and consultant managers.

2. Functional Elements

  • Search Consultants Bar:
    • Location: Top-left of the screen.
    • Function: Allows the admin to search for consultants by typing a name into the search field. The system will filter consultants based on the entered text.
  • Select Consultant Dropdown:
    • Location: To the right of the search bar.
    • Function: A dropdown list to select the current consultant being managed. In the image example, "William Brown" is selected.
  • Consultant Linked to [Consultant Manager's Name] Section:
    • Location: Below the consultant selection field.
    • Function: Displays a list of consultants already linked to the selected consultant manager (in this case, "William Brown").
    • Information Shown:
      • Consultant Full Name: Displays the full name of the linked consultant.
      • Actions:
        • Delink Button (Red): Used to remove the link between the consultant and the consultant manager. In this case, clicking the Delink button next to "Rose Pink" will delink her from William Brown.
  • Available Consultants Section:
    • Location: Below the list of linked consultants.
    • Function: Displays a list of consultants not currently linked to the selected consultant manager.
    • Information Shown:
      • Consultant Full Name: Shows the name of the available consultant.
      • Actions:
        • Link Button (Blue): Used to link an available consultant to the selected consultant manager. For example, clicking Link next to "Hank Mann" will link him to William Brown.

3. Icons and Buttons

  • Back Button (Top Left): Allows the admin to go back to the previous page or menu.
  • Chat/Help Icon (Top Right): Possibly for customer support or guidance if needed.

4. Actions Flow

Linking a Consultant:

  1. Search for or select a consultant using the dropdown.
  2. Scroll to the "Available Consultants" section.
  3. Click the Link button next to the desired consultant.
  4. The consultant will now appear in the "Consultants Linked to [Consultant Manager's Name]" section.

Delinking a Consultant:

  1. Search for or select a consultant using the dropdown.
  2. In the "Consultants Linked to [Consultant Manager's Name]" section, locate the consultant to be delinked.
  3. Click the Delink button next to the consultant's name.
  4. The consultant will now move to the "Available Consultants" section.

5. User Tips

  • Ensure the correct consultant is selected before performing any linking or delinking actions.
  • Use the search bar to quickly find specific consultants.
  • Always review the consultant's details (name and business) to avoid linking or delinking the wrong person.
